name: Catch the Ark
description:
Can you survive the jungle and Catch The Ark in this amazing former EDITOR'S CHOICE game?

A flood is coming and Catch the Ark’s three adorable creatures Titan, Boon, and Zuzu haven’t got an invite to board Noah’s Ark. Armed with just a raft, the trio must brave the jungle rapids where outrageous hazards, hungry enemies, and even grumpy old Noah himself is out to ensure they don’t make it out alive. Can you catch the ark?

WITHOUT A PADDLE
Steer the creatures’ raft down perilous rapids filled with rocks, hungry crocs, snapping fishes, and Noah’s explosive barrels to out run the tidal wave behind you and catch the ark.

EYES ON THE PRIZE
Take in Catch the Ark’s stunning scenery, wild water and jungle packed with everything from monkeys to dinosaurs. Keep an eye on your raft-bound trio to see some hilarious reactions and rich animations.

A RAFT OF EXTRAS
Collect shiny coins and spend them in the in-game store on power-ups such as the Pterodactyl and new boats such as the Hovercraft and Rubber Ducky.

Game Features:
• Colorful graphics and impressive animations
• Easy to pick up gameplay that’s hard to put down
• Full of missions to complete and ranks to obtain
• Challenge your friends through Facebook and climb the leaderboards
• UNIVERSAL: Works on iPhone, iPod touch and iPad

PLEASE NOTE:
This game features non-compulsory In-App Purchases. If you do not wish to use this feature please disable In-App Purchases in your device settings.
